short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A tool to modify HTML Spans ever so slightly

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Step 1: Open ACORD Form
Step 2: Inspect Page
Step 3: Select Span Mover in top panel selector
Step 4: Hit refresh
Step 5: Click on span
Step 6: Make Changes
Step 7: Right click > Save As > Webpage, Complete
Step 8: Find + Replace "./filename_files/" with "" (The resource files are pointed incorrectly)
Step 9: Profit
